entry.title: Game: Kingdom Hearts 1.5 HD Remix: Kingdom Hearts Final Mix (PS3, 2013)
entry.content:
Game: Kingdom Hearts 1.5 HD Remix: Kingdom Hearts Final Mix (PS3, 2013)20180110
I started the game and got through the first major cut-scene in
Traverse town when all the Final Fantasy characters are first
shown. The things on the island were really annoying. The graphics
are definitely HD'd but in a quite weird way. So far, the game is
nostalgic and fun.

Total time: 1:43
  • Video Games
  • Kingdom Hearts 1.5 HD Remix: Kingdom Hearts Final Mix
  • PS3
  • 2013

entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy 10 2 (HD Remaster) (PS3, 2014) (13)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy 10 2 (HD Remaster) (PS3, 2014) (13)20180109
I played through all bu the last few bosses. I went back and got
the Dark Knight and started to do some grinding in the Farplane. I
find this game to be pretty good but too full of junk to be super
interested in it. If the side quests were not so weird and tedious
(i.e. if it were more fighting and not so much strange puzzle
solving) then I think I enjoy the combat system enough to want to
do it, but I don't enjoy the system so much that I want to put
myself through it. I watched the endings on YouTube and it was
okay. The story of the game isn't that meaningful though because
it feels so unnecessary relative to FFX.

Total time: 22:17
  • Video Games
  • Final Fantasy 10 2 (HD Remaster)
  • PS3
  • 2014

entry.title: Movie: Before Sunset, starring Ethan Hawke and Julie Delpy (2004)
entry.content:
Movie: Before Sunset, starring Ethan Hawke and Julie Delpy (2004)20180109
I love that this takes place in real time. It is very interesting
how they made the personalities come alive and grow off screen in a
believable way. The challenges of youth become challenges of middle
age, it is very cute.
  • Movies
  • 2004

entry.title: Movie: Before Sunrise, starring Ethan Hawke and Julie Delpy (1995)
entry.content:
Movie: Before Sunrise, starring Ethan Hawke and Julie Delpy (1995)20180109
This movie was so cute and romantic. I loved how it was just one
long conversation. It reminded my wife and I so much of each other
because we had long real conversations when we first met.
  • Movies
  • 1995

entry.title: Movie: Baby Driver, starring Ansel Elgort (2017)
entry.content:
Movie: Baby Driver, starring Ansel Elgort (2017)20180108
This movie was filled with style and cleverness. I really liked it
a lot. The driving scenes were just amazing and the musical moments
were great. Lily James was essentially characterless, but quite
cute in her role.
  • Movies
  • 2017

entry.title: Game of Thrones - Season 2 - Episode 7 - A Man Without Honor (4)
entry.content:
Game of Thrones - Season 2 - Episode 7 - A Man Without Honor (4)20180108
Jaime is so terrible in this. We haven't seen him in a while and
you really don't like his actions. Dany's scenes were
intense... the first time I watched I didn't understand that the
Sorcerer wants her because dragons have made his magic
real. Theon's words are so prescient of what happens to
him. Ygritte steals her scenes with Jon. Sansa's tragedy
continues. I really enjoyed Arya's scene as well.
  • TV Shows
  • Game of Thrones

entry.title: Movie: Marie Antoinette, starring Kirsten Dunst (2006)
entry.content:
Movie: Marie Antoinette, starring Kirsten Dunst (2006)20180107
This movie is so beautiful and lush. The costumes and sets are
amazing. It got us pumped for our trip to Paris. Kirsten Dunst is
stunning in almost every scene.

entry.title: Movie: Les Visiteurs, starring Jean Reno (1993)
entry.content:
Movie: Les Visiteurs, starring Jean Reno (1993)20180106
This movie was hilarious. We were laughing out loud so much of
it. I was really surprised. I liked the subtle parts, like how
there were other holes in the witch's roof, etc. I also really
liked that all the characters were serious to their personality,
but the outcomes were hilarious.
  • Movies
  • 1993

entry.title: Game: Tabletop Simulator - Kingdom Death: Monster (Board, 2016) (6)
entry.content:
Game: Tabletop Simulator - Kingdom Death: Monster (Board, 2016) (6)20180105
I did another White Lion fight. I used the Advantage rules and
totally devastated it. I have clearly broken the game, so I think
I need to restart and play it completely honestly to really feel
what the game is about. It is fun to do this, but not enough.

Total time: 7:25
